attributes.name: Table of Contents (Z01: Island at the Axis of the World)
Act 3: Under the Wheel of Stars

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MKJiW6mPSjgviefQzem_description
attribs.current: Dafton makes three melee attacks: two with a melee weapon and one with his dagger. Or Dafton makes two ranged attacks with his daggers.

attribs.name: repeating_npcreaction_-MKJiW6nxiOoGxZaV1-9_description
attribs.current: Dafton adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Dafton must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MKJjrEBIBYvyzYNW3dd_description
attribs.current: Dafton attempts to take a melee weapon from another creature within 5 feet of him that he can see. He makes a Strength (Athletics) check contested by the target's Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check (the target chooses the ability to use).

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKJlSPZfyFML8CQpRlg_description
attribs.current: At the start of his turn, Grimsley can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKMO32GFfvrZJ8X36Ef_description
attribs.current: Sokana has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKMO32HCbrcFxkY0fz-_description
attribs.current:
Sokana is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Her spell casting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Sokana has the following sorcerer spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, shocking grasp
• 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, mage armor
• 2nd level (2 slots): misty step, scorching ray

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKMO3D2zGrye7V3rDKN_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action. If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKMO3D2zGrye7V3rDKN_spelltarget
attribs.current: One object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKMPxyxZgKuAybDCMpb_spelldescription
attribs.current: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn’t being worn or carried. This spell’s damage increases by 1d10 when you reach 5th level (2d10), 11th level (3d10), and 17th level (4d10).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKMPxyxZgKuAybDCMpb_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature or object within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKMPzMFABR-wPQcLfhf_spelldescription
attribs.current: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again. You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it. The hand can’t attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKMPzMFABR-wPQcLfhf_spelltarget
attribs.current: A point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKMQ0HRyrqcr7mXbsgt_spelldescription
attribs.current: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch. Make a melee spell attack against the target. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 lightning damage, and it can’t take reactions until the start of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKMQ0HRyrqcr7mXbsgt_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature you try to touch

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKMQLglCPSeh2NkwxoT_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKMQLglCPSeh2NkwxoT_spelldescription
attribs.current: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKMQN16N9vbUEdmRDKI_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a willing creature who isn’t wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The target’s base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends if the target dons armor or if you dismiss the spell as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKMQN16N9vbUEdmRDKI_spelltarget
attribs.current: A willing creature who isn't wearing armor

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MKMQR0P7ZOY30K1snyt_spelldescription
attribs.current: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MKMQTyuqeZDLfMmhNP0_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you create one additional ray for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MKMQTyuqeZDLfMmhNP0_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range. You can hurl them at one target or several. Make a ranged spell attack for each ray. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKMQjgp7SyIe-r3Os6m_description
attribs.current: Sokana possesses an elemental gem that contains a fire elemental.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MKMjvf74mFjOzKNHnSx_description
attribs.current:
If the target is an object that is not being worn or carried, the touch destroys a 1-foot cube of it. If the target is a creature, either a metal shield or metal armor (Sokana's choice) being worn or carried by the creature suffers a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed.

This antenna can only be used 5 times before it crumbles to dust.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKPpQcRPmEH6qpxapIG_description
attribs.current: On each of his turns, Ilton can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKPpQcSf8mzHQuytvlz_description
attribs.current: Ilton deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of his that isn't incapacitated and Ilton doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKPqFJowvSpHpbSBxP1_description
attribs.current: Ilton possesses two potions of healing and a potion of invisibility.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MKPtrUwgnFP7Z-cL2UL_description
attribs.current:
If the target is an object that is not being worn or carried, the touch destroys a 1-foot cube of it. If the target is a creature, either a metal shield or metal armor (the engineer's choice) being worn or carried by the creature suffers a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed.

This antenna can only be used 5 times before it crumbles to dust.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKZiTnfbcJoz8RRYWU2_description
attribs.current:
Duchess Ethelyn is a 10th level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). She knows the following sorcerer spells: 
• Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, mending, message, 
prestidigitation
• 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, expeditious retreat, mage armor, shield
• 2nd level (3 slots): enhance ability, invisibility
• 3rd level (3 slots): haste, lightning bolt
• 4th level (3 slots): confusion, dimension door
• 5th level (2 slots): teleportation circle

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKZiiXwMQFpD-2NQ0pv_spelldescription
attribs.current: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn’t being worn or carried. This spell’s damage increases by 1d10 when you reach 5th level (2d10), 11th level (3d10), and 17th level (4d10).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKZiiXwMQFpD-2NQ0pv_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature or object within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKZijsbT0uq6I8tLr-s_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action. If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKZijsbT0uq6I8tLr-s_spelltarget
attribs.current: One object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKZimDw59TSBlQGKejW_spelldescription
attribs.current: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again. You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it. The hand can’t attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKZimDw59TSBlQGKejW_spelltarget
attribs.current: A point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKZini-8QatWq5Z6tvb_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as a broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, a torn cloak, or a leaking wineskin. As long as the break or tear is no larger than 1 foot in any dimension, you mend it, leaving no trace of the former damage. This spell can physically repair a magic item or construct, but the spell can’t restore magic to such an object.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKZini-8QatWq5Z6tvb_spelltarget
attribs.current: A single break or tear in an object you touch

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKZip6LSBir8LuZtpCy_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A short piece of copper wire

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKZip6LSBir8LuZtpCy_spelldescription
attribs.current: You point your finger toward a creature within range and whisper a message. The target (and only the target) hears the message and can reply in a whisper that only you can hear. You can cast this spell through solid objects if you are familiar with the target and know it is beyond the barrier. Magical silence, 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood blocks the spell. The spell doesn’t have to follow a straight line and can travel freely around corners or through openings.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKZir7WOXLFfjBn-ZQq_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice. You create one of the following magical effects within range: You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint musical notes, or an odd odor. You instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire. You instantaneously clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot. You chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material for 1 hour. You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour. You create a nonmagical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand and that lasts until the end of your next turn. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKZitCJ-PPn3ce8JIll_spelldescription
attribs.current: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. If you sense magic in this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears magic, and you learn its school of magic, if any. The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKZiuqm6WkKqsUJPL74_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell allows you to move at an incredible pace. When you cast this spell, and then as a bonus action on each of your turns until the spell ends, you can take the Dash action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKZiwCGcQOo04pyr1lo_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a willing creature who isn’t wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The target’s base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends if the target dons armor or if you dismiss the spell as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKZiwCGcQOo04pyr1lo_spelltarget
attribs.current: A willing creature who isn't wearing armor

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MKZixg6eTGFxyZZeWAH_spelldescription
attribs.current: Choose a willing creature that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, the target’s speed is doubled, it gains a +2 bonus to AC, it has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it gains an additional action on each of its turns. That action can be used only to take the Attack (one weapon attack only), Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object action. When the spell ends, the target can’t move or take actions until after its next turn, as a wave of lethargy sweeps over it.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MKZixg6eTGFxyZZeWAH_spelltarget
attribs.current: A willing creature that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MKZizPrKQzegK9i9lYp_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MKZizPrKQzegK9i9lYp_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A bit of fur and a rod of amber, crystal, or glass

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MKZizPrKQzegK9i9lYp_spelldescription
attribs.current: A stroke of lightning forming a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 8d6 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The lightning ignites flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-MKZj0Rl3yVBW66-zwhQ_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the radius of the Sphere increases by 5 feet for each slot above 4th.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-MKZj0Rl3yVBW66-zwhQ_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell assaults and twists creatures’ minds, spawning delusions and provoking uncontrolled action. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw when you cast this spell or be affected by it. An affected target can’t take reactions and must roll a d10 at the start of each of its turns to determine its behavior for that turn.  d10        Behavior 1        The creature uses all its movement to move in a random direction. To determine the direction, roll a d8 and assign a direction to each die face. The creature doesn’t take an action this turn. 2–6        The creature doesn’t move or take actions this turn. 7–8        The creature uses its action to make a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach. If there is no creature within its reach, the creature does nothing this turn. 9–10        The creature can act and move normally.  At the end of each of its turns, an affected target can make a Wisdom saving throw. If it succeeds, this effect ends for that target.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-MKZj0Rl3yVBW66-zwhQ_spelltarget
attribs.current: Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-MKZj213UUm4rMmaMl1k_spelldescription
attribs.current: You teleport yourself from your current location to any other spot within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as “200 feet straight downward” or “upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle, 300 feet.” You can bring along objects as long as their weight doesn’t exceed what you can carry. You can also bring one willing creature of your size or smaller who is carrying gear up to its carrying capacity. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you cast this spell. If you would arrive in a place already occupied by an object or a creature, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 force damage, and the spell fails to teleport you.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-MKZj4RZM4uSn28rrAhN_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Rare chalks and inks infused with precious gems with 50 gp, which the spell consumes

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-MKZj4RZM4uSn28rrAhN_spelldescription
attribs.current: As you cast the spell, you draw a 10-foot-diameter circle on the ground inscribed with sigils that link your location to a permanent teleportation circle of your choice whose sigil sequence you know and that is on the same plane of existence as you. A shimmering portal opens within the circle you drew and remains open until the end of your next turn. Any creature that enters the portal instantly appears within 5 feet of the destination circle or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.  Many major temples, guilds, and other important places have permanent teleportation circles inscribed somewhere within their confines. Each such circle includes a unique sigil sequence - a string of magical runes arranged in a particular pattern. When you first gain the ability to cast this spell, you learn the sigil sequences for two destinations on the Material Plane, determined by the DM. You can learn additional sigil sequences during your adventures. You can commit a new sigil sequence to memory after studying it for 1 minute.  You can create a permanent teleportation circle by casting this spell in the same location every day for one year. You need not use the circle to teleport when you cast the spell in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MKZjBxLFlJcZkjuGAof_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MKZjBxLFlJcZkjuGAof_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Fur or a feather from a beast

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MKZjBxLFlJcZkjuGAof_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a creature and bestow upon it a magical enhancement. Choose one of the following effects; the target gains that effect until the spell ends. Bear’s Endurance. The target has advantage on Constitution checks. It also gains 2d6 temporary hit points, which are lost when the spell ends. Bull’s Strength. The target has advantage on Strength checks, and his or her carrying capacity doubles. Cat’s Grace. The target has advantage on Dexterity checks. It also doesn’t take damage from falling 20 feet or less if it isn’t incapacitated. Eagle’s Splendor. The target has advantage on Charisma checks. Fox’s Cunning. The target has advantage on Intelligence checks. Owl’s Wisdom. The target has advantage on Wisdom checks.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MKZjDujl38IV9aJi0mb_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MKZjDujl38IV9aJi0mb_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: An eyelash encased in gum arabic

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MKZjDujl38IV9aJi0mb_spelldescription
attribs.current: A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target’s person. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKZjKkZUYTQb7O0ntXZ_description
attribs.current:
Duchess Ethelyn has 10 sorcery points to spend on metamagic. She regains all spent sorcery points when she finishes a long rest. She can use only one of the following metamagic options on a spell when she casts it, unless otherwise noted:
• Empowered Spell (1 sorcery point): When Ethelyn rolls damage for a spell, she can reroll up to 4 damage dice. She must use the new rolls. She can use Empowered Spell even if she has already used a different metamagic option during the casting of the spell.
• Subtle Spell (1 sorcery point): When Ethelyn casts a spell, she can cast it without any somatic or verbal components.
• Quickened Spell (2 sorcery points): When Ethelyn casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, she can cast it as a bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKnbAmwjNaxOweF2pi3_description
attribs.current: The elemental can enter a hostile creature’s space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MKnbQUpKnhAjyyxI5qg_description
attribs.current: Each creature in the elemental’s space must make a DC 13 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 12 (3d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage and is flung up 10 feet away from the elemental in a random direction and is knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes an object, such as a wall or floor, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or takes the same damage and be knocked prone. If the saving throw is successful, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn’t flung away or knocked prone.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MKnbQUpKnhAjyyxI5qg_attack_onhit
attribs.current: 12 (3d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) bludgeoning per 10 feet thrown damage

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MKnedKkehHcsiuTgbEy_description
attribs.current: The target's strength score is reduced by 1d4 The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKnedKmFmEhaT1ZzkTH_description
attribs.current: The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKnedKmFmEhaT1ZzkTI_description
attribs.current: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +6.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKnedKoPzye41lGrmgO_description
attribs.current: While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

attribs.name: npc_condition_immunities
attribs.current: exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

attribs.name: npc_resistances
attribs.current: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

attribs.name: npc_senses
attribs.current: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 30 ft., passive Perception 10

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKnkhR-weGmH2VVXPQB_description
attribs.current: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn’t disturb the material it moves through.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKnkuJLAkQqsqTyL5Rf_description
attribs.current: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MKnkyN-WdPLKMHd-zlS_description
attribs.current: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKnpKZTO21Zvh6z1joK_description
attribs.current: Nicolas has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of his allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKnpqL6Cb4gCgOiZE1m_description
attribs.current: Nicolas possesses the golden icon of Nem and the golden icon of Urim.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKnqpyMCoAB9LaY8PA9_description
attribs.current: Nicolas's pistol misfires on a natural 1. Reloading it requires an action or bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MKoHFZoh7lpq7Gc8Iwj_description
attribs.current: Or with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKoHFZoh7lpq7Gc8Iwk_description
attribs.current:
The investigator is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh
• 1st level (2 slots): speak with animals, thunderwave

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MKoHFZoh7lpq7Gc8Iwj_attack_tohitrange
attribs.current: +2, Reach 5 ft., (+4 with shillelagh), one target

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKoHFfPpCRHMUTc6lu1_spelldescription
attribs.current: Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of the following effects within range: You create a tiny, harmless sensory effect that predicts what the weather will be at your location for the next 24 hours. The effect might manifest as a golden orb for clear skies, a cloud for rain, falling snowflakes for snow, and so on. This effect persists for 1 round. You instantly make a flower blossom, a seed pod open, or a leaf bud bloom. You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as falling leaves, a puff of wind, the sound of a small animal, or the faint odor of skunk. The effect must fit in a 5-foot cube. You instantly light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKoHFfQuNpZH6uM9jjr_spelldescription
attribs.current: A flickering flame appears in your hand. The flame remains there for the duration and harms neither you nor your equipment. The flame sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. The spell ends if you dismiss it as an action or if you cast it again. You can also attack with the flame, although doing so ends the spell. When you cast this spell, or as an action on a later turn, you can hurl the flame at a creature within 30 feet of you. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKoHFfQuNpZH6uM9jjr_spelltarget
attribs.current: Self or a creature within 30 feet of you

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKoHFfQuNpZH6uM9jjs_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Mistletoe, a shamrock leaf, and a club or quarterstaff

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKoHFfQuNpZH6uM9jjs_spelldescription
attribs.current: The wood of a club or quarterstaff you are holding is imbued with nature’s power. For the duration, you can use your spellcasting ability instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of melee attacks using that weapon, and the weapon’s damage die becomes a d8. The weapon also becomes magical, if it isn’t already. The spell ends if you cast it again or if you let go of the weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKoHFfQuNpZH6uM9jjs_spelltarget
attribs.current: The wood of a club or quarterstaff you are holding

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKoHFfRO5YNlxFCzov1_spelldescription
attribs.current: You gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts for the duration. The knowledge and awareness of many beasts is limited by their intelligence, but at minimum, beasts can give you information about nearby locations and monsters, including whatever they can perceive or have perceived within the past day. You might be able to persuade a beast to perform a small favor for you, at the GM’s discretion.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKoHFfRO5YNlxFCzov2_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKoHFfRO5YNlxFCzov2_spelldescription
attribs.current: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from you must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn’t pushed. In addition, unsecured objects that are completely within the area of effect are automatically pushed 10 feet away from you by the spell’s effect, and the spell emits a thunderous boom audible out to 300 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MKoJirV5D1WQZqJhGVN_description
attribs.current: The target must succeed on a DC 11 constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls unconscious for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature uses an action to shake it awake.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKoJirV5D1WQZqJhGVO_description
attribs.current: The pseudodragon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, hearing, or smell.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKoJirWhORsUkvmzfjV_description
attribs.current: The pseudodragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKoJirWhORsUkvmzfjW_description
attribs.current: The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

attribs.name: npc_languages
attribs.current: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

attribs.name: npc_senses
attribs.current: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 13

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MKoLJNxANxhMCtPlh88_description
attribs.current: The soldier makes two melee attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKoLJNxANxhMCtPlh8B_description
attribs.current: The soldier has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the soldier's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKoLlDPY4HufrP-SdeT_description
attribs.current:
The wizard is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The wizard has following wizard spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): light, ray of frost, shocking grasp
• 1st level (3 slots): feather fall, magic missile

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKoLlQEzPGbuJ5fdUd6_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action. If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKoLlQEzPGbuJ5fdUd6_spelltarget
attribs.current: One object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKoMSZRNPNCmPKuDUfH_spelldescription
attribs.current: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes 1d8 cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKoMU5TZvDk-A9eSFoz_spelldescription
attribs.current: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch. Make a melee spell attack against the target. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 lightning damage, and it can’t take reactions until the start of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKoMU5TZvDk-A9eSFoz_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature you try to touch

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKoMWI2esKXXVHT3UyU_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take when you or a creature within 60 feet of you falls

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKoMWI2esKXXVHT3UyU_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A small feather or piece of down

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKoMWI2esKXXVHT3UyU_spelldescription
attribs.current: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature’s rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If the creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet, and the spell ends for that creature.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKoMWI2esKXXVHT3UyU_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to five falling creatures within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKoMXe3nMsXcTYtJ17P_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spell creates one more dart for each slot above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKoMXe3nMsXcTYtJ17P_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKoMXe3nMsXcTYtJ17P_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MKoXDZfLtfYmjqoTiL1_description
attribs.current: The golem makes two melee attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKoXDZhr1spmRdmJeVw_description
attribs.current: Whenever the golem is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKoXDZhr1spmRdmJeVx_description
attribs.current: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKoXDZhr1spmRdmJeVy_description
attribs.current: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKoXDZhr1spmRdmJeVz_description
attribs.current: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

attribs.name: npc_condition_immunities
attribs.current: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

attribs.name: npc_immunities
attribs.current: fire, poison, psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

attribs.name: npc_languages
attribs.current: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MMFtRoFD4l7OEcGe094_description
attribs.current: The golem is blinded. It attacks wildly at any creature that comes within 10 feet of it.

attribs.name: npc_resistances
attribs.current: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from  nonmagical attacks

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKsRNkCd8ZlS41MWdzD_description
attribs.current: Gillie Dhu is mystically bonded to his hedge maze. Whenever Gillie Dhu starts his turn, he takes 1 point of fire damage for each hedge square in the labyrinth that is on fire. At the end of Gillie Dhu’s turn, every square of burning hedge adjacent to him burns up in a sudden flash and becomes clear terrain.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKsRn9KCgAff10xwYqg_description
attribs.current: Using his movement, Gillie Dhu can meld with any of his hedges, similar to how the spell meld into stone functions. He can remain melded with a hedge as long as he wishes and can exit on either side of the hedge..

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKsS6Nhye9Zg4P3EPk1_description
attribs.current: Gillie Dhu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKsSDqeG90IhcG3RsYN_description
attribs.current:
Gillie Dhu’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
• 3/day each: faerie fire, tree stride (hedges only)
• 1/day: entangle

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKsSOrVuJUf1uU106L0_spelldescription
attribs.current: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Any creature in the area when the spell is cast is also outlined in light if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed dim light in a 10-foot radius. Any attack roll against an affected creature or object has advantage if the attacker can see it, and the affected creature or object can’t benefit from being invisible.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKsSOrVuJUf1uU106L0_spelltarget
attribs.current: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-MKsSQn7q47ewZKuO3UR_spelldescription
attribs.current: You gain the ability to enter a tree and move from inside it to inside another tree of the same kind within 500 feet. Both trees must be living and at least the same size as you. You must use 5 feet of movement to enter a tree. You instantly know the location of all other trees of the same kind within 500 feet and, as part of the move used to enter the tree, can either pass into one of those trees or step out of the tree you’re in. You appear in a spot of your choice within 5 feet of the destination tree, using another 5 feet of movement. If you have no movement left, you appear within 5 feet of the tree you entered. You can use this transportation ability once per round for the duration. You must end each turn outside a tree.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MKsSS3Hb7LcHldM6xyg_spelldescription
attribs.current: Grasping weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square starting from a point within range. For the duration, these plants turn the ground in the area into difficult terrain. A creature in the area when you cast the spell must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be restrained by the entangling plants until the spell ends. A creature restrained by the plants can use its action to make a Strength check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself. When the spell ends, the conjured plants wilt away.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MKsSnknvqWder3HhhKD_description
attribs.current: Gillie Dhu makes two attacks with his club.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKuPDAzfySQPlRqbyKQ_description
attribs.current: Asrabey knows the prestidigitation cantrip, and can cast it at will.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MKuPMYpyqdnuoichrdl_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice. You create one of the following magical effects within range: You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint musical notes, or an odd odor. You instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire. You instantaneously clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot. You chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material for 1 hour. You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour. You create a nonmagical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand and that lasts until the end of your next turn. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKuPOmOu3Zo5bzruAcY_description
attribs.current: Asrabey has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can’t put him to sleep.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKuPUMEVYBMoYqvmlxT_description
attribs.current: Asrabey has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKuPZ85qnSyvfdDxH12_description
attribs.current: While wearing heavy armor, Asrabey reduces any bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage taken from nonmagical weapons by 5.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MKuPhKaxTOHsN74ymkU_description
attribs.current: Asrabey makes four melee attacks. If his lion shield is dancing, it makes an attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MKuQRlqrg993qvZR68Q_description
attribs.current: The shield may grapple the target (escape DC 15). While grappling a creature, the shield cannot attack any other creatures.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKuR3nS8QVZhi9F5ofE_description
attribs.current: Asrabey can take the Dodge action as a bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKuRKU4ksiGt6adtHbV_description
attribs.current: Asrabey does not have disadvantage from his plate armor on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MKuRZBUcQIl6AUSbctg_description
attribs.current: Asrabey can change his blade from a longsword to a whip (or back) as a bonus action.
